mx.org.pescadormvp.examples.jsonp.client

Class ActiveComponentSetup

  • java.lang.Object
    • mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.components.ComponentSetup
      • mx.org.pescadormvp.examples.jsonp.client.ActiveComponentSetup
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RegionManager, RootRegionManager

    public class ActiveComponentSetup
extends ComponentSetup

    This class, together with its inner classes and interfaces, provides a full configuration of the modular framework. It specifies which components are active, activates GinModules that specify dependency injections, and specifies a provider for the root widget for the viewport.

    Perhaps at a later date this boilerplate could be reduced using annotations and code generation.

    Author:
    Andrew Green

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ActiveComponentSetup.ActiveSetupGinjector
      Activate all necessary GinModules for DI in the components to use, as well as for basic infrastructure.
      static class  ActiveComponentSetup.ActiveSetupGinModule
      Local GIN module, with general bindings for this app that are not part of the larger framework.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class mx.org.pescadormvp.core.client.components.ComponentSetup

        ComponentSetup.LoadingPleaseWait, ComponentSetup.PescadorMVPGinjectorHolder

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ActiveComponentSetup(ComponentRegistry componentRegistry, Layout layout, QueryComponent queryComponent)
      Sets specific bindings; Backreferences (from components back to ActiveComponentSetup) are set as components are received.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void startUp()
      This method calls the superclass's static startup method, providing the PescadorMVPGinjector to use, and in this case, requesting the injection of some JS, too.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ActiveComponentSetup

        @Inject
public ActiveComponentSetup(ComponentRegistry componentRegistry,
                           Layout layout,
                           QueryComponent queryComponent)

        Sets specific bindings; Backreferences (from components back to ActiveComponentSetup) are set as components are received.

        Also set the root region provider.

        Note: components that rely on automatic generation of internationalized Messages by Maven must also set up the appropriate configuration in the pom.xml.

    • Method Detail

      • startUp

        public static void startUp()
        This method calls the superclass's static startup method, providing the PescadorMVPGinjector to use, and in this case, requesting the injection of some JS, too.
